game.name: Rhythia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 앱 내 구매, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Rhythia is a game about aiming and hitting musical beats with precision timing, within a dynamic 3x3 grid system. Use your reflexes to target flying blocks, combine accurate aim with perfect rhythm, and finally master the leaderboards against players who challenge your precision skills.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rhythia is a game about aiming and hitting musical beats with precision timing, within a dynamic 3x3 grid system. Use your reflexes to target flying blocks, combine accurate aim with perfect rhythm, and finally master the leaderboards against players who challenge your precision skills.
